name: Loki (itch)
description:
Play as Loki the trickster god of chaos; Ensure the new inhabitants of this planet don't create order by punishing them with your abilities. Launch an Asteroid, curse them with Plagues, and inflict Madness!

This was supposed to be my entry to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 but I went way over the allotted time limit. I tried to rush to finish so there are still several bugs and issues to resolve but I am calling this "finished"

Source code: Github Repo
Youtube: Feeziks Gaming
Youtube: Feeziks GameDev
